TITLE: What if You Could Give Start-Up Money to People, Not Companies?
SUMMARY: The entrepreneurial Liberman siblings are testing out the concept — on themselves.

TITLE: Nine Migrants Drown as Dozens Are Swept Down Rio Grande
SUMMARY: A large group attempting to cross into Texas was overcome by a fast-moving current, the authorities said.

TITLE: How to Stay Hydrated in a Heat Wave
SUMMARY: Many countries across the globe are facing dangerously high temperatures. Here’s what to do to stay safe.

TITLE: Thousands Gather to Pay Final Respects to Mikhail Gorbachev
SUMMARY: At the funeral of Mikhail S. Gorbachev, the last Soviet leader, the size of the crowds signaled the depth of the regret about the undoing of the freedoms that his tenure initiated.

TITLE: NASA Scrubs Artemis I Rocket Launch to the Moon
SUMMARY: Engineers were unable to resolve a hydrogen leak, which led the launch director to call off Saturday’s flight.

TITLE: Republicans Are Showing Contempt for the Rules
SUMMARY: The party is turning against a political commitment to fairness.

TITLE: ‘House of the Dragon’ Is Less Sexist and Racist. But Is it Good?
SUMMARY: The showrunners say they’ve heard and responded to criticism of ‘Game of Thrones,” but some say that has made the new show boring.

TITLE: The Post-Colonoscopy Male Friendship Test
SUMMARY: What the pandemic, parenthood and nomadism took away from my life, I replaced with surprisingly intimate connections with other men.

TITLE: What Is Owed to Pakistan, Now One-Third Underwater
SUMMARY: The Global North can help Pakistan by taking responsibility for the losses and damages of extreme weather fueled in part by the burning of fossil fuels.

TITLE: A Volcano Erupted Without Warning. Now, Scientists Know Why.
SUMMARY: A new study explains how Nyiragongo, a volcano in the Democratic Republic of Congo, was relatively quiet before its eruption last year took everyone by surprise.

TITLE: Why Is Pickleball So Popular?
SUMMARY: Everyone and their mother seems to be playing. What’s the draw — and is it really a workout?

TITLE: As Serena Williams Plays Her Final Matches, a Generation Is Inspired
SUMMARY: Women across the country have seen their own lives reflected in the triumphs and trials of the tennis superstar. Cue the swell of emotion.

TITLE: Why We Get Motion Sick, and How to Stop It
SUMMARY: Experts say prevention is the best cure.
